explanation: [0-0] A hand is holding a pink, inflated balloon against a blue-green background. The gray caption "5-MINUTE CRAFTS" is displayed at the bottom of the video.

[0-8] The hand slightly releases the bottom of the balloon, causing it to deflate quickly. Then, one hand gently pinches the balloon while the other uses scissors to cut a small portion off the edge of the pink balloon. Immediately, the right hand takes a pale yellow balloon from the left and covers the cut portion of the pink balloon. The hand then shows the inflation port of the balloon to the camera, revealing that the pale yellow balloon has been placed inside the pink one.

[17-22] The funnel is removed, and a left hand holds the previously cut pink balloon, its opening now sealed. The section where it was cut reveals a portion of the water-filled pale yellow balloon containing colorful glitter. The right hand places a pink bow on the water balloon as decoration. Subsequently, the left hand squeezes the water balloon, causing the exposed portion of the pink balloon to bulge outward. The camera focuses on the expanding part of the water balloon, showcasing the sparkling glitter swirling within the water.
